Plot all shapes on the same graph

pile.Rd

Plot all shapes on the same graph

pile(x, f, ...)

Arguments

x

a mom_tbl object
f

a column (factor or numeric) for colouring shapes
...

additional parameters to feed ggplot2::geoms

Note

formerly named stack

See also

Other family_picture: inspect(), mosaic()

Examples

bot %>% pile()
# global spec
bot %>% pile(col="gold")
# aes bounded to x columns
bot %>% pile(type) # you can omit ggplot2:: if it's loaded

# a more complex example
bot %>% pile(type) +
   ggplot2::facet_grid(~type) +
   ggplot2::scale_colour_manual(values=c("forestgreen", "orange"))
